responses.default: I'm not sure how to respond to that.
responses.hello: Hello! How can I help you today?
responses.hi: Hi there! How can I assist you?
responses.how are you: I'm doing well, thank you for asking!
responses.what's your name: I'm ChatBot, nice to meet you!
responses.help: I can chat with you! Just type your message and I'll respond. Type 'exit' to end the chat.
